titles.title: Providing for mandatory drug testing of Members of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to contract with a private entity for the random mandatory testing of House Members for the illegal use of controlled substances. Outlines the procedures for conducting such drug testing, which include providing the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct the results of such tests. Directs the Committee to take action under House rules in the case of positive test results.
